rules.title: Ascertain Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance for New Patients
rules.action: Ask if the new patient has dental insurance

rules.title: Request Insurance Provider Name
rules.condition: Patient confirms they have dental insurance
rules.action: Ask for the name of their dental insurance provider
rules.example: Which dental insurance provider do you have?

rules.title: Request Insurance Plan Type
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (e.g., PPO or HMO)
rules.example: And what type of plan is that, PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Inquire About Primary Insurance Holder
rules.condition: Patient has provided their insurance plan type
rules.action: Ask if the patient is the primary holder of the insurance policy
rules.example: Are you the primary holder of this insurance policy?

rules.title: Inform Out-of-Network Status
rules.condition: Office is out of network with the provided insurance
rules.action: Inform the patient that the office is out of network
rules.example: Our office is currently out of network with [Insurance Name]. Would you still like to proceed?

rules.title: Repeat Question for Clarification
rules.condition: User asks for clarification or indicates they didn't understand
rules.action: Repeat the last question or statement clearly
rules.example: Certainly. I was asking, 'Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?'
